user_stories.title: Cross-validate M1/M2 file lists
user_stories.story: As the Impact Analysis Orchestrator, I want a Verifier agent that cross-references M1's affected files with M2's entry point chains, so that file list inconsistencies are detected before consolidation.

user_stories.title: Detect risk scoring gaps
user_stories.story: As the Impact Analysis Orchestrator, I want the Verifier to check that M3's risk assessment accounts for M1's coupling analysis and M2's chain depth, so that risk scores reflect the full picture.

user_stories.title: Validate analysis completeness
user_stories.story: As the Impact Analysis Orchestrator, I want the Verifier to ensure every entry point maps to an affected file and every affected module has a risk assessment, so that no gaps flow into downstream phases.

user_stories.title: Invoke Verifier from orchestrator
user_stories.story: As the Impact Analysis Orchestrator, I want to automatically invoke the Verifier after M1/M2/M3 complete, so that cross-validation happens transparently without manual intervention.

user_stories.title: Create Verifier agent definition
user_stories.story: As a framework developer, I want a well-structured Verifier agent definition that follows existing agent conventions, so that it integrates seamlessly with the impact-analysis agent family.

user_stories.title: Structured verification report
user_stories.story: As the Impact Analysis Orchestrator, I want the Verifier to produce a structured report with severity-categorized findings, so that I can include critical issues in the executive summary and INFO-level items in an appendix.

user_stories.title: Register Verifier skills
user_stories.story: As a framework developer, I want the Verifier's skills registered in the skills manifest, so that skill observability and audit trails work correctly.

user_stories.title: Fail-open on Verifier errors
user_stories.story: As the Impact Analysis Orchestrator, I want the Verifier to fail open if it encounters errors, so that Phase 02 is never blocked by a verification failure.

user_stories.title: Support both feature and upgrade workflows
user_stories.story: As the Impact Analysis Orchestrator, I want the Verifier to work with both feature workflow and upgrade workflow outputs, so that cross-validation covers all use cases.
